content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the alytaus district court the specific case number is e217845582022 the court resolved the case regarding matrimonial property awarding the apartment basement to the applicant and the vehicle to the defendant the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicants legal fees and court fees the text discusses two articles from the civil code one about shareable property and the other about the deviation of equal shares in community property the applicant sought a divorce on grounds of fault and requested the division of matrimonial property as well as child support the court considered the interests of both parties and awarded costs to the applicant the defendant was ordered to pay the applicants legal costs stamp duty and postage costs
